data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3553883,"name":"Henry Feyen","username":"MangoHen","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/5f8ce5/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-11T12:16:12.016Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eHi all, my team is having some issues with one of our swerve modules. We are using MK4i swerve modules with Krakens and CanCoders. Recently we took one module off the robot as it was missing a bearing; however, upon reconnecting, it is now behaving abnormally.  Upon enabling the robot, the module begins to do this: \u003ca href=\"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1NqKca1UUOTmh4AGWPDbxAcpyJpdcd1hG/view?usp=sharing\" class=\"inline-onebox\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003e1964467245862895102.MP4 - Google Drive\u003c/a\u003e. We used Phoenix Tuner to generate our swerve code and the motor performs weirdly even within the Phoenix Tuner swerve tests. It performs the Azimuth test well except for some weird twitching due to the movement that is already taking place as soon as the robot is enabled. However, during the drive test, the wheel turns in circles rapidly instead of rotating the wheel to spin forward. Any ideas as to what the issue could be? We have verified that all the motors are correctly assigned by blinking the krakens; after thinking it was an issue with the cancoder, it was swapped on the module we were having issues with, but it was correctly defined to that module as we were able to blink it, but this didn’t fix the issue. The module seems to rotate fine by hand, and we faced no issues with configuring it with Phoenix tuner before so we are unsure what might be causing this issue. Any help/ideas would be much appreciated!\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":1,"updated_at":"2025-03-11T12:16:12.016Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":28,"readers_count":27,"score":15.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":495138,"topic_slug":"swerve-module-quickly-changing-directions-and-spinning-when-robot-is-enabled","display_username":"Henry Feyen","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1NqKca1UUOTmh4AGWPDbxAcpyJpdcd1hG/view?usp=sharing","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"1964467245862895102.MP4 -
